page.title: 14Halloween 31st October 1985
page.content: On Thursday it was Halloween.David Bridle came to my house and we went out Trick or Treating.This means that we ask people if they want a trick played on them or are they going to give us a small present.We went with some of our friends and we dressed up as ghosts.We started out at 5.30p.m. and we went straight down the road.We got a lolly from one house and a toffee from another house.Then we started to run round the village because some people attacked David and I with flour bombs and water bombs.They had some porridge oats,Fairy Liquid and eggs.We ran from house to house and we got lots of money and we got a few sweets.We saw lots of other people Trick or Treating.We gave the money we collected to help buy food for the people in Ethiopia. Nicky Jackson.
